articles.title: Australia's Steve Smith retires from ODI cricket after Champions Trophy exit
articles.description: Steve Smith retires from one-day international cricket following Australia's Champions Trophy defeat by India.
articles.content:
Steve Smith has retired from one-day international cricket following Australia's semi-final exit from the Champions Trophy.
The 35-year-old made 170 appearances for Australia in his 50-over career, … [+878 chars]
